mapper.select: select head_url,nickname,title,remarknum,visitnum,type,paykiss,a.id,istop,isgood,releasetime,typename from userinfo u join articleinfo a on u.id=a.userid join articletype art on art.id=a.type group by releasetime desc limit 0,10

select userid,head_url,nickname,title,remarknum,visitnum,type,paykiss,a.id,istop,isgood,releasetime,typename from userinfo u join articleinfo a on u.id=a.userid join articletype art on art.id=a.type where istop=1 or isgood=1 group by istop desc,isgood desc,releasetime desc limit 0,4

select userid,head_url,nickname,title,remarknum,visitnum,type,paykiss,a.id,istop,isgood,releasetime,typename from userinfo u join articleinfo a on u.id=a.userid join articletype art on art.id=a.type group by releasetime desc limit #{pageindex},#{pageSize}

select head_url,nickname,title,remarknum,visitnum,type,paykiss,a.id,istop,isgood,releasetime,typename,isdone,content from userinfo u join articleinfo a on u.id=a.userid join articletype art on art.id=a.type where a.id=#{id}
select * from articleinfo where userid=#{userid} and type=1 order by releasetime desc
select a.id,a.title,remarktime,c.content from commentinfo c join articleinfo a on c.artorcommid=a.id where c.userid=#{userid} order by remarktime desc
